Package com.example.qrcodeteam30

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CalculateScoreController
    Calculate the score
    ChangeProfileActivity
    An interface for changing the profile of the user (password, first name, last name)
    CheckSameQRCodeActivity
    Check if any user scanned the same QR Code The criteria of "same": Same content and same location The QR Code that does not have location info will not be include in the searching process
    Comment
    This model class represents a comment to a QR code Including date of posted, content, the author, and the username of the owner of the QRCode that Comment belongs
    CustomListRankingController
    Custom adapter for showing all the ranking of the players based on total score Use with RankingActivity
    CustomListViewAllCommentController
    Custom adapter for showing all the comment of a QR Code Use with ViewAllCommentActivity
    CustomListViewAllQRCodeController
    Custom adapter for showing all the QR codes of the user Use with ViewAllQRCodeActivity
    EstimateMyRankingActivity
    Estimate the user's ranking in terms of Max score, Min score, Total score, the number of QR Code Ranking is shown in Percentile
    MainActivity
    This activity is the interface for sign in.
    MapQRCodeActivity
    Show the location of the QR Code on a map
    MyBitmapController
    Handling anything related to Bitmap (Photo)
    MyCryptographyController
    Handling anything related to cryptography (hash, encrypt, decrypt) TO DO: Implement an encrypt/decrypt algorithm for QR Code content (planned using AES-256)
    MyFirestoreUploadController
    Handling anything related to modify the Google Firestore database (on cloud) Because of the limitation of Android, unfortunately for the download part, it is integrated in the Activity (View) class, and we cannot separate it into its own class like this
    MyPermissionController
    Handling asking permission
    MyProfileActivity
    Showing the user information (username, name) Includes button to launch activity to change profile, estimate QR Codes ranking Include button to show a unique QR Code for automatic log in
    PlayerMenuActivity
    The main menu for the app, with five buttons represent five major features of the code.
    QRCode
    This model class represents a QR code and its properties Includiong username that the QR code belongs to, the content, the location, the date of taken The score, the reference to the list of comment on Firestore, the format (QR code/barcodes/...), the reference to the photo on Firestore
    QRCodeInfoActivity
    Show the info of the QR Code This info includes its score and its date of taken It is also an interface for viewing the Photo of the QR Code (if there is), a button to launch the activity for the location of the QR Code in the map, and a button to launch an activity to view all comments.
    RankingActivity
    Display the ranking of all users based on their total score
    SearchQRCodeActivity
    This activity represents the activity that allows user to browse QR Code from a map Clicking on any marker to see that QR Code information Automatically centered the map at the current location If the location is not turned on, centered the map at the University of Alberta
    SearchUsernameActivity
    This activity represents the interface for the user to search other user Then, the user can see which QR Codes do the other user have (by press the search button)
    SignUpActivity
    This activity is the interface for sign up.
    UserInformation
    This model class represents the basic information of a user Username, password, firstName, lastName, his/her total score, and the list of QR Code
    UserProfileActivity
    Shows the user profile of any user This includes their name, username,a button to view all of his/her QR Code, and a delete user button (if the current logged in user is admin)
    UserStatisticsActivity
    Display the statistics of the QR Codes the user have (max, min, sum, average)
    ViewAllCommentActivity
    An interface for showing all the comments of the QR Code, adding and deleting comment
    ViewAllQRCodeActivity
    Display all the QR Codes the user have
